extendedInfo.description: The soundboard you've been waiting for now available for your Android device! Father Ted Soundboard features all your favorite sounds clips from the hit TV show! Listen to sound effect clips, themes and quotes from characters such as Father Ted Crilly, Father Dougal McGuire, Father Jack Hackett, Mrs Doyle, Bishop Brennan, Father Dick Byrne, Father Noel Furlong, Father Fintan Stack, Father Austin Purcell, Father Fintan Fay, Father Jessup, John and Mary O'Leary, Tom, Pat Mustard and Eoin McLove. Why not carry around those Father Ted moments with you wherever you go? Try it out for free!App features:* 258 sounds from the series!* Set sounds as ringtones, notification tone or as alarm tone!* Save sounds to your SD card!* Sleek and easy to use user interface!* Allows user to export app to SD card!* Share the app with your friends!Note:* You can navigate tabs by either touching the titles at the top, or by swiping the screen.* More sounds on each page can be found by scrolling.* To set a sound as a ringtone, notification tone or an alarm tone simply hold down a button.* Sounds are saved to media/audio/ringtones on your SD card.* Updates will now only be applied to devices with Android 2.2 and above. Apologies for any inconvenience.Permissions fully explained:* FULL INTERNET ACCESS- For displaying small banner advert* MODIFY/DELETE SD CARD CONTENTS- For saving ringtones to the SD card* MODIFY GLOBAL SYSTEM SETTINGS- For setting up ringtonesFather Ted is produced by Hat Trick Productions and is property of Channel 4. No copyright infringement intended.A DeadlyFastApps 2013 Production.

reviews.comment: Has tweeked the app and has added nearly every character in the show.

reviews.title: Great but didn\'t like update\'s artwork

reviews.title: Has everything-epic
reviews.comment: This father Ted app is perfect for all fans of the brilliant tv show. The layout is simple to use, it has pretty much all the best quotes from the program and with the option of setting anything as your ring tone, it hasn\'t missed anything.
